name: Four Layer Delight
author: JTEXAS
summary: This is great dessert for any time of year.  You can easily change the flavor by substituting a different pudding in place of the butterscotch (we also like chocolate a lot).
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant butterscotch pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Coat a 9x13 inch baking dish with cooking spray
In a bowl, cream together margarine with 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar
Mix in flour and 1 cup pecans
Bake in preheated oven 15 minutes, until very lightly browned
In a bowl, cream together cream cheese with remaining 1 cup confectioners' sugar
Fold in half the whipped topping
Stir together pudding mix and milk and allow to set up slightly
Top with remaining whipped topping and sprinkle with remaining nuts
